name: Alien Mothership
text:
Each time an "Alien" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, place 2 A-Counters on this card. You can remove A-Counters from either side of the field to activate these effects:
2 Counters: Target 1 face-up monster on your opponent’s field; place 1 A-Counter on that target.
4 Counters: Add 1 "Alien" card from your Deck or GY to your hand.
6 Counters: Target 1 monster on your opponent’s side of the field, take control of that target until the End Phase. It cannot attack or activate its effects.
